inclusion.criterion: clinically node-negative (or unclear nodal status) substudy I
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: signed consent from the study participant
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cytologically verified lymph node metastasis/es at diagnosis (substudy I)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients not able to give an informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypersensitivity or allergy against blue dye or isotope
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer, currently using multivitamins and smoking frequently.
